demos.name: Memory-Enhanced Debugging
demos.example_code:
from wizards_consolidated.software import MemoryEnhancedDebuggingWizard

wizard = MemoryEnhancedDebuggingWizard(pattern_storage_path="./patterns/debugging")

result = await wizard.analyze({
    "error_message": "TypeError: Cannot read property 'map' of undefined",
    "file_path": "src/components/UserList.tsx",
    "correlate_with_history": True,
})

print(f"Matches found: {result['matches_found']}")
if result['historical_matches']:
    match = result['historical_matches'][0]
    print(f"Best match: {match['similarity_score']:.0%}")
    print(f"Fix: {match['fix_applied']}")
demos.expected_output:
Matches found: 2
Best match: 100%
Fix: Added default empty array fallback: data?.items ?? []

demos.name: Tech Debt Trajectory
demos.description: Track debt over time, predict critical thresholds
demos.example_code:
from wizards_consolidated.software import TechDebtWizard

wizard = TechDebtWizard(pattern_storage_path="./patterns/tech_debt")

result = await wizard.analyze({
    "project_path": ".",
    "track_history": True,
})

print(f"Total items: {result['current_debt']['total_items']}")
print(f"Trend: {result['trajectory']['trend']}")
print(f"30-day projection: {result['trajectory']['projection_30_days']}")

demos.name: Security Learning
demos.example_code:
from wizards_consolidated.software import SecurityLearningWizard

wizard = SecurityLearningWizard(pattern_storage_path="./patterns/security")

result = await wizard.analyze({
    "project_path": ".",
    "apply_learned_patterns": True,
})

print(f"Raw findings: {result['raw_findings_count']}")
print(f"After learning: {result['summary']['total_after_learning']}")
print(f"Noise reduction: {result['learning_applied']['noise_reduction_percent']}%")
demos.expected_output:
Raw findings: 108
After learning: 23
Noise reduction: 78.7%

demos.name: SBAR Clinical Handoff
demos.example_code:
from wizards_consolidated.healthcare import SBARWizard

wizard = SBARWizard(pattern_storage_path="./patterns/clinical")

result = await wizard.generate({
    "patient_id": "PT-12345",
    "situation": "72-year-old male with acute chest pain",
    "background": "History of CAD, previous MI 2019",
    "assessment": "Suspected unstable angina",
    "recommendation": "Cardiology consult, serial troponins",
})

print(f"SBAR generated: {result['document_id']}")
print(f"Priority: {result['priority']}")
